sentences.english: Jong Un was reportedly educated at the International School of Berne, which he attended under a pseudonym
sentences.chinese: 据报道，金正云在伯尔尼的国际学校以化名就读。

sentences.english: It said the 26-year-old was a parliamentary candidate, citing unidentified sources.
sentences.chinese: 据说26岁的金正云是一个议员，这个消息来源不明。

sentences.english: The Chinese news reports about the visit did not mention the son, however.
sentences.chinese: 不过中国有关金正日访华的新闻报道并未提及金正云。

sentences.english: The idea is that Mr Chang will act as a kind of regent.
sentences.chinese: 张成泽将扮演摄政王的角色，支持金正云。

sentences.english: Kim Jong-un, shown here at age 11, is the third son of North Korean leader Kim Jong-il.
sentences.chinese: 朝鲜领导人金正日的三儿子金正云，11岁的照片。
